steps.275: Cut-Cut 1/4 block or 3 ounces of fresh tofu into large cubes (about 1 in x 1 in)
steps.276: Turn-Turn on the heat to medium
steps.277: drizzle-drizzle 1 tablespoon soy sauce (watch for spitting) on the pan
steps.278: drizzle-drizzle with the 1 tablespoons sesame oil on the pan
steps.279: add-add the tofu cubes to the pan
steps.280: remove-Briefly remove the pan from the heat to reduce spitting
steps.282: remove-Briefly remove from the heat again
steps.286: add-add 1/4 tsp salt to the pan
steps.288: cook-cook pan for 2 minutes until the colour is darkened
steps.291: Add-Add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to a non-stick pan
steps.292: Cook-Cook 5 to 6 minutes until tofu cubes are lightly browned on the bottom
steps.293: pat-pat tofu dry with a towel
